framework.project

Class StandardProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.project.StandardProject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Project
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProjectWrapper

    public class StandardProject
extends Object
implements Project
    A "standard" project. That is, an IDE-based java project.
